text:
(Since it's the release day, I couldn't help but take a peek...
 They've put up panels for L'Antica here, haven't they?)

(...I wonder how many people
are buying our new songs...?)

Oh, it's L'Antica's album~! I really like that new song
they played on the radio the other day!

You're buying the CD? Streaming is nice too,
but having it on display is kinda special, isn't it?

Exactly~! They look so cool at first glance, but at live
shows they're passionat and talk funny, I adore them!

I've always admired idols...
And now, I'm the one being admired...

To keep it that way...
I'll tighten my focus and give it my all...!
